title: JaneliaSciComp/multifish pipeline parameters
description: Analysis pipeline for EASI-FISH (Expansion-Assisted Iterative Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization)

data.title: Data
data.description: Describe your input data and where pipeline results should be saved

data_manifest.description: Name or path to the file manifest for downloading input data. Default: segmentation
data_manifest.help_text: If specified, the data in the manifest is downloaded into `--data_dir` before the pipeline begins. Valid values are any base filename found in the data-sets directory (e.g. "demo_small", "demo_medium") or any absolute path which points to a manifest file. By default this just downloads the segmentation model.

verify_md5.description: Verify MD5 sum for all downloads. Default: true
verify_md5.help_text: This can be disabled to save time, but it's not recommended.

shared_work_dir.description: Shared working directory accessible by all nodes. Typically something like /fsx/username/pipeline
shared_work_dir.help_text: Setting this parameter will automatically configure `data_dir`, `output_dir`, `segmentation_model_dir`, `spark_work_dir`, and `singularity_cache_dir`. You can override any of them in the hidden settings. When running on a system like AWS Batch, you should set this to an FSx for Lustre filesystem, and the final_output_dir to a Fuse-mounted S3 bucket. This will cause all processing to happen on high-performance disk, and the outputs will only be copied to slower S3 at the very last step.

data_dir.description: Path to the directory containing the input CZI/MVL acquisition files. If shared_work_dir is defined, this defaults to $shared_work_dir/inputs.
data_dir.help_text: If `shared_work_dir` is defined, this is automatically set to `$shared_work_dir/inputs`.

segmentation_model_dir.description: Path to the directory containing the machine learning model for segmentation.
segmentation_model_dir.help_text: If `shared_work_dir` is defined, this is automatically set to `$shared_work_dir/inputs/model/starfinity`. It is assumed that either the model is already there, or it will be downloaded and unzipped according to the `data_manifest`. Otherwise it defaults to ${projectDir}/external-modules/segmentation/model/starfinity, which is normally configured by setup.sh.

output_dir.description: Path to the directory containing pipeline outputs. If shared_work_dir is defined, this defaults to $shared_work_dir/outputs.
output_dir.help_text: If `shared_work_dir` is defined, this is automatically set to `$shared_work_dir/outputs`.

publish_dir.description: Optional publishing directory where results should be copied when the pipeline is successfully completed. Typically a Fusion mount path like /fusion/s3/bucket-name.
publish_dir.help_text: This is useful for getting data off of FSx and onto something externally accessible like S3.

acq_names.description: Names of acquisition rounds to process. These should match the names of the CZI/MVL files found in the data_dir.
acq_names.help_text: e.g. LHA3_R3_small,LHA3_R5_small if you have files called LHA3_R3_small.czi and LHA3_R5_small.czi

ref_acq.description: Name of the acquisition round to use as the fixed reference.

channels.description: List of channel names to process.
channels.help_text: Channel names are specified in the format "c[channel_number]", where the channel_number is 0-indexed.

dapi_channel.help_text: The DAPI channel is used as a reference channel for registration, segmentation, and spot extraction.

bleed_channel.description: Channel (other than DAPI) that needs bleedthrough correction.

stitching_output.description: Output directory for stitching results. Default: stitching
stitching_output.help_text: This directory path is relative to `output_dir`

spark_work_dir.description: Path to directory containing Spark working files and logs during stitching. Default: $shared_work_dir/spark or $workDir/spark
spark_work_dir.help_text: The Spark configuration is written here by the pipeline before launching the Spark cluster. The Spark workers write their logs back here, and it is also used to communicate the master IP address to all workers. Therefore, this must be a shared directory accessible to both the head node and all worker nodes. On AWS, Fuse-mounted S3 will not work here due to write buffering. It's best to use FSx, but EBS will also work, as long as its mounted on all the EC2 nodes.

spark_local_dir.description: Path to directory that Spark will uses for local temporary files. Default: /tmp
spark_local_dir.help_text: This path does not need to be shared among workers, and does not need to be accessible to the head node. Usually, /tmp will do.

stitching_czi_pattern.description: A suffix pattern that is applied to acq_names when creating CZI names e.g. "_V%02d"

stitching_ref.description: Index of the channel used for stitching, e.g. 'c1' or '1'. You can also specify 'all' to use all of the channels. Default: the dapi_channel
stitching_ref.help_text: If this is not defined it defaults to `dapi_channel`

resolution.description: Voxel resolution in all 3 dimensions. Default: 0.23,0.23,0.42
resolution.help_text: This is a comma-delimited tuple as x,y,z.

axis.description: Axis mapping for the objective->pixel coordinates conversion. Default: -x,y,z
axis.help_text: Comma-separated axis specification with optional flips.

stitching_block_size.description: Block size to use when converting CZI to n5 before stitching. Default: 128,128,64

flatfield_correction.description: Apply flatfield correction before stitching? Default: true

retile_z_size.description: Block size (in Z dimension) when retiling after stitching. Default: 64
retile_z_size.help_text: This must be smaller than the number of Z slices in the data.

with_fillBackground.description: Use fillBackground option when running fuse step. Default: true
with_fillBackground.help_text: Turning this off may help process certain types of data that error otherwise.

stitching_padding.description: Padding for the overlap regions. Default: 0,0,0

stitching_blur_sigma.description: Sigma value of the gaussian blur preapplied to the images before stitching. Default: 2

workers.description: Number of Spark workers to use for stitching one acquisition. Default: 4

worker_cores.description: Number of cores allocated to each Spark worker. Default: 4

gb_per_core.description: Size of memory (in GB) that is allocated for each core of a Spark worker. Default: 4
gb_per_core.help_text: The total memory usage for stitching one acquisition will be workers * worker_cores * gb_per_core.

driver_memory.description: Amount of memory to allocate for the Spark driver. Default: 15g

wait_for_spark_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait for Spark cluster to start. Default: 3600

sleep_between_timeout_checks_seconds.description: Number of seconds to sleep between timeout checks. Default: 2

stitching_app.description: Path to the JAR file containing the stitching application. Default: /app/app.jar

registration_output.description: Output directory for registration results. Default: registration

aff_scale.description: The scale level for affine alignments. Default: s3

def_scale.description: The scale level for deformable alignments. Default: s2

registration_xy_stride.description: The number of voxels along x/y for registration tiling. Default: 256

registration_xy_overlap.help_text: Defaults to registration_xy_stride/8 when not specified.

registration_z_stride.description: The number of voxels along z for registration tiling. Default: 256

registration_z_overlap.help_text: Defaults to registration_z_stride/8 when not specified.

ransac_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for RANSAC. Default: 1

ransac_memory.description: Amount of memory for RANSAC. Default: 1 G

spots_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Spots step of registration. Default: 1

spots_memory.description: Amount of memory for Spots step of registration. Default: 2 G

interpolate_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Interpolate step of registration. Default: 1

interpolate_memory.description: Amount of memory for Interpolate step of registration. Default: 1 G

coarse_spots_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Coarse Spots step of registration. Default: 1

coarse_spots_memory.description: Amount of memory for Coarse Spots step of registration. Default: 2 G

aff_scale_transform_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Affine Scale Transform step of registration. Default: 1

aff_scale_transform_memory.description: Amount of memory for Affine Scale Transform step of registration. Default: 15 G

def_scale_transform_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for deformable scale registration. Default: 8

def_scale_transform_memory.description: Amount of memory for Deformable Scale Transform step of registration. Default: 80 G

deform_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Deform step of registration. Default: 1

deform_memory.description: Amount of memory for Deform step of registration. Default: 10 G

registration_stitch_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for Stitch step of registration. Default: 2

registration_stitch_memory.description: Amount of memory for Stitch step of registration. Default: 20 G

registration_transform_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for final Transform step of registration. Default: 12

registration_transform_memory.description: Amount of memory for final Transform step of registration. Default: 80 G

segmentation.title: Cell Segmentation
segmentation.description: Options for the cell segmentation algorithm (Starfinity)

segmentation_output.description: Output directory for segmentation results. Default: segmentation

segmentation_scale.description: Imagery scale to use for segmentation. Default: s2

segmentation_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores for segmentation. Default: 3

segmentation_memory.description: Amount of memory for segmentation. Default: 45 G

spot_extraction_output.description: Output directory for spot extraction results. Default: spots

spot_extraction_scale.description: Scale of imagery to use for spot extraction. Default: s0

airlocalize.title: Spot Extraction: Airlocalize
airlocalize.description: Options for the AirLocalize spot extraction algorithm

airlocalize_xy_stride.description: The number of voxels along x/y for registration tiling. Default: 1024
airlocalize_xy_stride.help_text: Must be power of 2. Increasing this requires increasing `airlocalize_memory`.

airlocalize_z_stride.description: The number of voxels along Z for registration tiling.  Default: 512
airlocalize_z_stride.help_text: Must be a power of 2. Increasing this requires increasing `airlocalize_memory`.

default_airlocalize_params.description: Path to the default AirLocalize parameter file. Default: /app/airlocalize/params/air_localize_default_params.txt
default_airlocalize_params.help_text: By default, this points to default parameters inside the container

per_channel_air_localize_params.description: Comma-delimited paths to alternative AirLocalize parameter files, one per channel.
per_channel_air_localize_params.help_text: If you have 4 channels, and you are extracting spots from c0, c1, and c3, this parameter should look like this: `/path/to/params_c0.txt,/path/to/params_c1.txt,,/path/to/params_c3.txt`. Note the double comma to denote the empty file for c2, which should not be processed.

airlocalize_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores to allocate for each AirLocalize job. Default: 1

airlocalize_memory.description: Amount of RAM to allocate to each AirLocalize job. Needs to be increased when increasing strides. Default: 2 G

rs_fish.title: Spot Extraction: RS-FISH
rs_fish.description: Options for the RS-FISH spot extraction algorithm

use_rsfish.description: Use RS-FISH instead of AirLocalize for Spot Extraction. Default: false

rsfish_min.description: Minimal intensity of the image. Default: 0

rsfish_max.description: Maximal intensity of the image. Default: 4096

rsfish_anisotropy.help_text: Scaling of z relative to xy. Can be determined using the RS-FISH anisotropy plugin in Fiji.

rsfish_sigma.description: Sigma value for Difference-of-Gaussian (DoG) calculation. Default 1.5

rsfish_threshold.description: Threshold value for Difference-of-Gaussian (DoG) calculation. Default: 0.007

rsfish_background.description: Background subtraction method, 0 == None, 1 == Mean, 2==Median, 3==RANSAC on Mean, 4==RANSAC on Median. Default: 0 (None)

rsfish_intensity.description: Intensity calculation method, 0 == Linear Interpolation, 1 == Gaussian fit (on inlier pixels), 2 == Integrate spot intensities (on candidate pixels). Default: 0 (Linear Interpolation)

per_channel.rsfish_min.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_min

per_channel.rsfish_max.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_max

per_channel.rsfish_anisotropy.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_anisotropy

per_channel.rsfish_sigma.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_sigma

per_channel.rsfish_threshold.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_threshold

per_channel.rsfish_background.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_background

per_channel.rsfish_intensity.description: Comma delimited per channel values for rsfish_intensity

rsfish_params.description: Any other parameters to pass to the RS-FISH algorithm.
rsfish_params.help_text: Complete parameter documentation for RS-FISH is [available here](https://github.com/PreibischLab/RS-FISH-Spark/blob/main/src/main/java/net/preibisch/rsfish/spark/SparkRSFISH.java).

rsfish_workers.description: Number of Spark workers to use for RS-FISH spot detection. Default: 4

rsfish_worker_cores.description: Number of cores allocated to each RS-FISH Spark worker. Default: 4

rsfish_gb_per_core.description: Size of memory (in GB) that is allocated for each core of a RS-FISH Spark worker. Default: 4
rsfish_gb_per_core.help_text: The total memory usage for one acquisition will be workers * worker_cores * gb_per_core.

rsfish_driver_cores.description: Number of cores allocated for the RS-FISH Spark driver. Default: 1

rsfish_driver_memory.description: Amount of memory to allocate for the RS-FISH Spark driver. Default: 15g

spot_warping.title: Spot Warping
spot_warping.description: Options for warping detected spots to registration

warp_spots_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores to use for warp spots. Default: 2

warp_spots_memory.description: Amount of memory for warp spots. Default: 30 G

intensities.title: Intensity Measurement
intensities.description: Options for extracting quantified measurements of spot intensities

measure_intensities_output.description: Output directory for intensities. Default: intensities

measure_intensities_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores to use for intensity measurement. Default: 1

measure_intensities_memory.description: Amount of memory for intensity measurement. Default: 8 G

spot_assignment.title: Spot Assignment
spot_assignment.description: Options for mapping spot counts to segmented cells

assign_spots_output.description: Output directory for spot assignments. Default: assignments

assign_spots_cpus.description: Number of CPU cores to use for spot assignment. Default: 1

assign_spots_memory.description: Amount of memory for spot assignment. Default: 5 G

containers.title: Container Options

mfrepo.description: Docker registry/repository to use for containers. Default: public.ecr.aws/janeliascicomp/multifish
mfrepo.help_text: By default, the pipeline uses containers built as part of this project and deployed to DockerHub. You can rebuild the containers and deploy them to your own Registry and specify it here.

spark_container_repo.description: Docker container repo for stitching. Default: `<mfrepo>`

spark_container_name.description: Docker container name for stitching. Default: stitching

spark_container_version.description: Docker container version for stitching. Default: 1.0.0

registration_container.description: Docker container for running registration and warp_spots. Default: `<mfrepo>`/registration:1.2.0

segmentation_container.description: Docker container for running segmentation. Default: `<mfrepo>`/segmentation:1.0.0

airlocalize_container.description: Docker container for running spot extraction. Default: `<mfrepo>`/airlocalize:1.0.2

spots_assignment_container.description: Docker container for running intensity measurement and spot assignment. Default: `<mfrepo>`/spot_assignment:1.2.0

containers.description: Customize the Docker containers used for each pipeline step

other.title: Other Options

skip.description: Comma-delimited list of steps to skip, e.g. stitching,registration.

singularity_cache_dir.description: Shared directory where Singularity containers are cached. Default: $shared_work_dir/singularity_cache or $HOME/.singularity_cache

singularity_user.description: User to use for running Singularity containers. Default: $USER
singularity_user.help_text: This is automatically set to `ec2-user` when using the 'tower' profile

runtime_opts.help_text: Runtime options for Singularity must include mounts for any directory paths you are using. You can also pass the --nv flag here to make use of NVIDIA GPU resources. For example, `--nv -B /your/data/dir -B /your/output/dir`
runtime_opts.description: Runtime options for the container engine being used (e.g. Singularity or Docker).

lsf_opts.description: Options for LSF cluster at Janelia, when using the lsf profile.

other.description: Other global options affecting all pipelines stages
